title: BluffTitler Pro 12.3.0.1 Multilingual + Crack [SadeemPC].zip
description:
BluffTitler Pro 12.3.0.1 Multilingual

BluffTitler is a Windows desktop app for creating, rendering and playing 3D video effects. Want to impress your family, friends and clients with spectacular 3D titles and intro videos? But do not want to use complex and expensive 3D animation software? BluffTitler makes it easy and affordable to add 3D effects to your videos!	

Super fast
BluffTitler uses state of the art 3D game technology to render your animations in realtime. Exporting as video is super fast.

Lots of templates
The installer comes with hundreds of demo shows.

Magically easy
Complex 3D rendering techniques are offered as easy to use effects.

With BluffTitler you can create short, spectacular 3D animations:
- titles
- intros
- outros
- bumpers
- promos
- special effects

What's new in BluffTitler 12.3.0.1:
- 2 new properties in the camera layer: Brightness and Gamma
- 2 new properties in the sketch layer: Texture position and Texture size
- Normalmap and displacementmap effects now have a Normal strength property for fine tuning lighting
- Normalmap and displacementmap effects now have a Border size property for blending the borders in the background
- Support for 48 bits displacementmaps
- tag in the text and scroller layers displaying the total number of particles
